website_summaries.verdict: This humane dog training collar is a thrifty way to train your dog to stop barking.
pros: Easy to adjust for the desired sound and or vibration deterrent

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god what a godsend this is!! Ive got a staffie dog who just loves to bark at everything and anything that he can so a friend recommended i give one of these a try and i wish id bought one sooner!!. Not only is it safe and no harm to your dog it does exactly what its meant to do. It has 4 different settings for the vibration intensity so you can find a happy medium of which vibration will work. My neighbours are also happy at this as well!! It comes in a nice little box which could be given as a gift (if you know of any other noisy dogs lol)
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a white alsatian and I was pleasantly surprised to see this collar fit her! She does tend to bark at the slightest noise or just when she is too excited so thought I would give this a try. It does actually work! Her barking has reduced and she is calmer without being harmful to her so I couldn't ask for much more really.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar for my beloved dog as he was barking all night and my neighbours were not happy at all. After careful research I found this product and I can say it is truly amazing. It is very dog friendly and doesn’t stress him at all. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Polina Dimitrova

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Training Collar
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found this product. My dog is an absolute menace the minute he sees another dog on his walks. I would have a hard time controlling him and his incessant barking. I had even tried to hire a trainer but didn't get the results I needed. I decided to try this collar because it mentioned humane training method. It simply vibrates every time my dog starts to get excited and bark. The vibrations help him stay calm and on his first walk with this collar, it was like he was a different dog! The walk was so peaceful and manageable. I'm in love with this collar and the difference it's made for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Avinav Nigam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar for my small dog as he doesn't stop barking and disturbing my neighbours. I was searching for the most dog friendly product on the market and found this one. This gadget is truly amazing, it uses vibration and sound and calms down my dog really well. I am so happy with this product and cannot recommend it highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Polina Dimitrova

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my dogs but I have to admit I'm not a fan of the constant barking especially when they're in their favourite spot at the window barking at everyone who walks by! However this product is great and works by vibrating whenever the dog barks; it's totally humane, looks smart and works as it should! It even comes with batteries so you can use it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: DramaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Had us in stitches
customer_reviews.text: My staffy is a typical mouthy staffy, and I love her to bits but wow is she loud, especially in my.small kitchen. Well we put it on her in the kitchen where she sleeps and she barked it went of and she went straight to her toy box to.see what was squeaking. We were in stitches at her. She had it on in the back garden and it works a treat, she's only braked a couple of times. Im very pleased with my.purchase. Just remember to turn it off when its not being worn to save on the battery. Excellent buy *************
customer_reviews.author: jenny bacon

customer_reviews.title: Functions well: beeps are ineffective but the vibrations kick in too late.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected: it looks huge on our Jack Russell. It functions well enough but the beeping doesn't distract him from barking. The vibrations are effective though, as it piques his curiosity and makes him look around. It would be handy if the vibration could be the main intervention because by the time it kicks in, the dog has already barked several times. I'm not really sure what use we can make of it like this so will probably return it. I'll give it a few more days.
customer_reviews.author: VicHoon

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the prongs!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, in good order,collar works as described. The collar is fully adjustable, aesthetically pleasing and robust; however one issue; the collar has two large plastic prongs (Vibration ) on back of box. Although these are not for use like a prong collar they could cause discomfort and potential injury to a dog. I have attached a thick foam around them , initially I used the collar inside out with the prongs facing out, it works this way. If the prongs were more 'studs' I would give the product a 5 *
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, doesn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Device looks nice and solid, my dog border collie doesn't mind to wear this collar at all. Sadly it doesn't work for him. Harvey barked a lot when he's at the new place left alone or with stranger or usually when some stranger approach the door (sales men, postmen etc.) First few times he was surprised and didn't know what that sound it is and where it is coming from but after that he got used to and starts ignoring it. I'm sure this product works perfectly well, price is brilliant too.. but for anxious border collie it isn't solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collars
customer_reviews.text: I dislike having to use them in the first place dogs are meant to bark .they are actually very good the dogs got the idea very quickly not to bark so for that reason I would reccommend them very highly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked almost instantly.
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that barks at the TV every time an animal comes onscreen so thought we'd give this a go. The effect was almost instantaneous and we wish we'd got one years ago. We actually managed to sit through some David Attenborough without a peep from the hellhound. I'm giving it 4 stars because there is no way to turn it off without taking the battery out which makes it a bit of a faff if you only need to use it a few hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: R Haynes

customer_reviews.title: cheap item, low in quality, battery can not be charged
customer_reviews.text: This bark collar is cheap item, whole thing is made of plastic, very soft. It has to use batterys, can not be charged and it is very hard to find the same battery and cost a lot and battery pollution as well. This is not a good product, it does not work well on my dog as well, the beep and vibration is very weak, no effect on my dog barking, battery runs out quick and as battery is running out, the beep and vibration gets weaker and weaker. This is completely waste of money and my time. 100% return。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I was a bit dubious as have tried other non-harmful, kind bark deterrents which my dogs have just laughed at🤣🤣. However, this time is was great. Product was good tried it on myself and only a noise and a vibrate - nothing more than a mobile phone- it worked instantly. The service I got from this seller was superb. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, didn't work at all. Kept sliding round my small dogs neck,, had to keep tightening it and the spike things stuck in her neck as well as nearly choking her, I don't know what it would be like on a big dog? BUT definitely not good for a small dog.. complete waste of money, ( for me anyway )
customer_reviews.author: jance pauline berry

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Wish I bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, easy to fit, works well. Dog stops barking when it beeps. Wish I bought it years ago, could have saved me a fortune on antibark treatments, felaway plugs and training courses. The postman loves it, he can deliver post without being barked at. Lol. She is learning she can bark at the park, not so much at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Diva

customer_reviews.title: Helped loads
customer_reviews.text: So far its had helped with my 8 month old beagle from barking at anything and everything. It worked within the first couple of days. Makes a noise and then sends a vibration.. which isn't painful as I tried it on my arm first before placing on my dog. We use when leaving her and gardern.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it one evening and it arrived the following afternoon. Product worked immediately and I was thrilled with the result until until the dog's kennel mate chewed it off! The dog in question was very noisy at certain times of the day, through excitement at feeding times etc, and the collar put a stop to it immediately but without hurting or frightening the dog. Thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: While wearing this collar, my dog shows no sign of discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this collar has a calming effect on my small dog, when we drive past dog walkers I no longer feel like holding my ears. On our walks my dog is able to pass by other dogs with minimum fuss. I also feel happy no pain is inflicted.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJ

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless - for my dog anyway. He is not a particularly bad barker, but several times a day he goes nuts at the neighbours dog. This collar actually made him worse - he barked to activate it!! It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Stops my spaniel barking - lost plastic electrode comments though
customer_reviews.text: Stopped the spaniel barking at the first beep. It’s not had to vibrate yet but does when I’ve tested it. Unfortunately it comes with some fiddly probes you need to screw on. I’ve lost one of the short ones so stuck using longer ones which really isn’t ideal.
customer_reviews.author: mc_lukus2

customer_reviews.title: No Barking
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I am very happy with the collar,I put in on puppy 1st day for 1/2 a day ,then 2nd day all day ,not night ,and no barking , now only put in on puppy 🐕 when he starts barking .so it is working, thank you so much😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work even on highest volume.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my staffy. My mam has her while I'm at work and she doesnt bark at mine but she does at my mams. So I purchased this collar. First problem is no matter how tight we have this collar it twists round so never stays at the front. The 4 noises it makes with her 4 barks doesn't bother her, and the vibration doesn't startle her. She's a huge softy but this collar is no match for her. I wont ask for a refund but I would not recommend for all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic collar
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this collar I have very small dog and I was able to reduce collar size so this is for small to large dogs ,my Rosie was a barker but after three weeks of using she is no longer barking every time she goes out in garden ,collar was very well made and instructions for use very easy to understand packaging was very very good collar was very well made and quite sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia kerton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this item. It hasn't worked once when my dog has barked. The prongs need to be pressed against your dogs throat to work but iF I tightened it any more it would be so uncomfortable for my dog. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: All Bla

customer_reviews.title: top marks
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my life 😅 working nights my dog barks at every passing noise even the wind. The noise it makes is a bit loud but better than the barking that my dog makes when not wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Clough

customer_reviews.title: Effective and good VFM
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be "always on" after the battery is fitted so you don't have to switch it on before use like collars we have used previously, but doesn't run down the battery too quickly! Our dogs react quickly when it activates! Sometimes when one dog barks the other's collar bleeps and shuts her up before she starts!! i
customer_reviews.author: Mick Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Anti bark collar
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend to help with her dog barking. Easy to use as it works automatically. She said it is helping after the 3rd bark when the vibration kicks in but he isn't put off by the beeping
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyChimes

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but ineffective sadly..
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok, easy to operate, but unfortunately didn’t work with our terrier.. she looks confused, but then carries on barking- doesn’t seem to associate the the two things as connected!!
customer_reviews.author: cozza

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product however my dog quickly cottoned on and tried to bark quieter at first but she now has gone back to herself as she doesn't care about the collar and ignores it
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Barking collar
customer_reviews.text: I only use the beep on low because the vibration bit scares my dog so i don't use that bit. But saying that the low beep worked straight away for what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: csmith

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and does what it promises very well. Works wonders if you have a dog and live in an apartment etc. My neighbors were not very happy with my dog barking at night so I bought this product and I love that it doesn't shock your dog like other products on the market, and is 100% humane. Comes with an e-book about canine psychology. The seller has communicated well as well, all over good experience. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Goktug Ferhan Chomunoglu

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally do reviews but I am over the moon with this product, my lab will go out in the garden and bark non stop for us to go out any play, or same in the house just barks demanding for attention, this has 7 advancements and only ever gets to the 1st beep and stops barking, it’s only been 3 days and he’s stopped all together, I do take it off during play time ect as he is a dog after all, I just want to stop the continues barks
customer_reviews.author: sonya r.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Bought just to calm my Shih Tzu’s barking a little and it really works! He’s only had it on a few times but I can see he’s now thinking before barking. Causes no harm, just a whistle and a slight vibration. Great value for money and a nice looking collar too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tamzin191

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly in perfect condition. I bought 2 worked great on 1 dog straight away the other a older more stubborn little Barker it's taking longer but she's getting there. A great training tool. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Collar is working well, my dog is more quiet, is cheaper than in other sellers:) highly recommend a seller, great contact:)))
customer_reviews.author: Mileencaa

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars...
customer_reviews.text: My dog does a high pitch bark and the device doesn’t seem to activate when he does this, but goes off when he yawns 😂
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Take prongs out!
customer_reviews.text: I took the device apart and unscrewed the hard prongs that dig into the dogs neck as I thought this was cruel digging into the dogs throat. It works the same without having them and put a stop to my dogs barking
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Product is not working at all! Tried in any way possible. It’s not doing the job and our dog cannot care less! It’s a NO!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked straight away. My dog used to bark at the neighbours dog , or kids playing outside, but I put this on and he stopped barking just when it beeped..... it hasn’t even gotten to the vibrate stage yet!!!! Easy to set up and adjusts very easily too. Have had two peaceful days. My dog only wears it during the day as he is fine overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlz

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar works really well not too loud. Fits well. The customer service is excellent if you have any issues they are there to personally help you. Even better it is a family run business so it’s lovely to help out an independent business. For reference my dog is a sproodle (small / medium dog).
customer_reviews.author: agathe

customer_reviews.title: Magic invention
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. My dog stopped barking within minutes of having it on we still keep it on but reduced the level of vibration. Excellent piece of kit. Would highly recommend. No harm to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service it arrived on time and packed well. Product exactly as advertised and definitely works. I have 3 small dogs and when the device goes off, all 3 of them stop barking instantly. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great works well
customer_reviews.text: It is great works well , but unfortunately the dog doesn't like it ( he dosen't like anything round his collar) so eventually he pulls it off and chews it
customer_reviews.author: Louise Hourcastagnou

customer_reviews.title: Good company poor product
customer_reviews.text: The company are great but the collar is no good at all, the dog just Carries on barking and the noise it makes is so loud it affects us more than the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this, we have a small dog that barks constantly at anything and everything, he can smell the post man in the next street, lol and never stops yapping, Within the hour of putting this on he sust it out barks once, hears the beep and stops, its amazing thankyou, highly recommended x
customer_reviews.author: marie brown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant device, my little Jack Russell hates it. Stops her barking straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Not brilliant had to by 2 of them in the last month as they stopped working not very happy !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Bit flimsy, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery, decent product. Stops dog barking, but no good for spaniels as not waterproof or lunatic proof
customer_reviews.author: gash

customer_reviews.title: it actually works
customer_reviews.text: It is great, day 2 and the annoying barking had stopped. Day 5 barking has reduced even when the collar is off. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Shirley mills

customer_reviews.title: it dose work just follow the instructions 😁
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, came next day. My pup and dog wearing them and it dose work, they hardly bark and when they do they shut up when it gos off. They Where them in the garden as they bark next door neighbour dogs and it was driving me nuts so glad ive got them 😀
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wolff

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product due to only having it for slightly over a month it now doesnt work at all and it now appears that i am unable to obtain a refund as the return window has closed, rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cairney

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first
customer_reviews.text: The product was great at first and stopped my dog barking but now he's got used to it and it doesn't really work now 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Michala Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about getting a collar like this for my dog because I didn’t want it to cause him stress. He doesn’t mind having it put on him at all and it calms him right down after the first bark. Definitely worth a try if you have a noisy dog.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Undecided yet
customer_reviews.text: At the moment it doesn't seem to be stopping my dog from constantly barking but need to give it more time. Also my dog is only little & the actual device swamps him.. it was described as good for all size dogs which yes the collar is but not the actual device
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Delivery and is Working
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and does seem to work well for our little dog. Coupe of things, how do you know which level setting you are on as there is no indicator of this and secondly I did email for your e-book but so far not arrived. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chas Brooke

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. We had used another collar previously which was ok but found this one a couple of weeks ago. My dog is a monkey and barks at EVERYTHING! Now completely stopped I didn’t think it was possible! Thank you! Can’t recommend this product highly enough
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Grainger

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Has made a massive and immediate difference to how much my dog barks. Excellent product that really works
customer_reviews.author: P. Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity sensor not good
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed as reviews were excellent however the sensitivity sensor is very hard to activate. I have to blow extremely hard and my dog barks don't activate it. I've tried turning the sensitive control and changing to new batteries but still it's very hard to activate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Can't find the batteries for this. Runs out very quickly. Worked on my yapper for about a day and then she figured it out and it went in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Visser

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, my dog is happy to wear it and isn’t distressed when it does buzz but equally it works a treat and is really effective. Only improvement is my dog is a small/medium size and it wouldn’t fit anything smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. We got ours delivered on the Thursday put them straight on our dogs (we have 2). They worked straight away, after a few hours we had much calmer dogs and now a week on they rarely bark. I wish I got these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Has worked wonders with my terrier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as my dog's barking around the house was getting out of control and I wanted something humane. After the first day of using the collar there was a massive improvement, he hardly barks now! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natalie brennan

customer_reviews.title: It works great and causes no harm
customer_reviews.text: Works straight away, our dog Alfie normally goes barking mad at any noise outside, this stops him immediately after 1 bark, peace at last
customer_reviews.author: peter cronin

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I initially brought thus for my 4 month maltese because their known to be very territorial and bark a lot. i was sad to discover it didn’t fit him, but i simply paper clipped it and it’s 100% effective and worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: The right position on dogs trachea
customer_reviews.text: I was wary first few walks but now my german shepherd is reluctant to bark when alarm goes off well pleased with the product yours sincerely Michael
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the product well made and strong. Didn’t work for my dog, but he does have problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing non harmful device
customer_reviews.text: This device really has helped our little lily with calming her down. I Would recommend this to anybody who wants to help train there dog in a way that allows the dog to self correct and learn not to bark.
customer_reviews.author: clarke household

customer_reviews.title: Instant
customer_reviews.text: Having used a similar collar before, this was just as successful. Instant relief from constant night-time barking, our dog now wears it as part of her night time routine, though she rarely needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Worked brilliantly. Since we lost our Huskey in Julie the little dog kept barking all night long every night none stop and since I bought this he stopped and never barking during the night at all.
customer_reviews.author: Samo2005

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't think it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I put the collar on he went out side and barked the buzzer went off he stopped straight away the second time he went out he barked and it never had any effect
customer_reviews.author: Antony smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product well made have purchased for my dog and friends dog.Arrived on time no issues.
customer_reviews.author: corinne armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Initial packaging says suitable for small/medium/large dogs. I would say medium to large but not small. Collar is thick and sturdy, but too much for small dog.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work got us, returned and used a humane muzzle for 2 days. He hates it, so just the threat of it works!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Williams

customer_reviews.title: Peace at last
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic collar. Distracts our dog when she starts barking. She stops immediately and will look around to see where the beeping is coming from. Brilliant..
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a try I tried others didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I have this device a couple of weeks and so far it is very good. My bichon was always barking continuously and now only barks once or twice and stops huge improvement. Life is a lot better 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bichon lover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my 11 month Jack Russel X barking on first use. Why did I not purchase one before.
customer_reviews.author: loulou

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money,did absolutely nothing to stop our dog from barking.so sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Another Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gutted when i lost the collar so had to purchase another as it really does work and recommend it as its not harmful, just sends out a sound out if the dogs barks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size and sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I am finding that one u use of my pug does not gave the sensitivity as the one I use on my daschund. The one fir my dashund is a bit big. But just tuck in strap
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Liddle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived promptly and the dog has been quieter than ever.
customer_reviews.author: RWillis

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great with delivery etc. BUT It doesn’t work on my German shepherd... she doesn’t even realise it’s beeping or vibrating
customer_reviews.author: Laura Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery product as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and has helped enormously, only had to use it a couple of times and my wee dog knows that one or two barks is fine but then calms down.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Stark

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Exceeds expectations, results have been great so far. My dog is much calmer and friendlier to other dogs when we go for walks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this product and I find it very effective. I will definitely be buying again if need so. Delivered in no time. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: eileen Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Good, safe device
customer_reviews.text: Good little product definitely a good, safe way to alert your dogto stop barking
customer_reviews.author: Beverly C.

customer_reviews.title: Dose the job
customer_reviews.text: Worked straight away only barking a cuppa of times and stopped soon as the collar goes on my dog know
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product really helps with the barking very happy with purchase good fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: The beep and vibration is very weak, was not effective on my dog. Was a waste of money for me
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Vo 888

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all, no sound is produced Have had success with similar products other brands
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy use and works very well little or no barking would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Great at first but its stopped working after a couple of vibrations
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garner-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Working well at moment
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5, some were for friends. For us they seem to be working well 😃 barking has eased, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: It stops the dog barking when she goes into garden . Very effective and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This has made such a difference to our lives. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: olivia m.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We've always had a good natured dog but doorbells and activity in the street outside would often set him off. Our dog is now quiet thanks to this and doesn't seem to resent it either!
customer_reviews.author: John Blanch

customer_reviews.title: That this coller does work
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and really helps to stop the barking money well spent
customer_reviews.author: edward adcock

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works well, arrived the same day as I ordered too
customer_reviews.author: Emma Charnock

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast product is great and helps so much
customer_reviews.author: miss a davies
